name: Puppet Battle
description:
A fun and challenging arcade game with a completely unique Single Touch Control system, cool physics, and RPG elements!

ARCADE
Tap and hold the puppet's torso to control it. Collect parts and train your reflexes! Don't touch the obstacles, or your puppet will lose its limbs!

RPG
Assemble your puppets and send them to fight against your opponent's team. Upgrade your team, collect loot, and climb up the leaderboards to overtake other players.

+ Unique control scheme using 3D touch controls!
+ Stunning 3D graphics and animation!
+ Collectible card system that includes characters, weapons, and items!
+ Over 100 weapons with powerful spells and amazing special effects!
+ Multiplayer leaderboards with 5 different leagues!
